quest.name: An Unforeseen Bargain
journal: This distressed soldier has ill tidings to share with you.

A horde of voidsent has been sighted approaching from the east, prompting an immediate evacuation of the area. Alisaie asks Zero to assist in the effort, but she refuses, stating that she will not risk her life without suitable compensation. Jullus, however, succeeds in persuading Zero to help guard Tertium by reminding her of the buuz he gave her. With the memoriate keeping watch, Alphinaud believes that the encampment will be safe enough in your absence, and suggests heading outside to find your other comrades.

Together with Alphinaud and Alisaie, you seek out Y'shtola and the others. Fortunately, they are quite capable of defending themselves, though it remains to be seen how Jullus and Zero are faring back at Tertium.

You later learn that, while you and the twins were occupied with rampaging voidsent, Jullus received word that a unit had gone silent while en route to Camp Broken Glass. As he prepared to set out from Tertium to investigate, Zero, much to his surprise, offered to go in his stead. She arrived in time to save a pair of soldiers from voidsent, but soon found herself overwhelmed. Thankfully, you arrived in time to save her and put the enemy to rout.

With the danger passed, you enjoy a brief moment of respite while waiting for Zero to recover and Y'shtola and the others to return. In that quiet aftermath, Alisaie muses what might have compelled Zero to─despite her earlier objections─resolve to risk her life to save others...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: This seems urgent...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I've got a bad feeling about this.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Well? Shouldn't you see what's wrong?

dialogue.name: JULLUS
dialogue.text: He was out on patrol, so if he's come back early, then...

dialogue.name: GARLEANSOLDIER10320
dialogue.text: Forgive me the interruption, but I come with grave news!

dialogue.name: GARLEANSOLDIER10320
dialogue.text: A horde of voidsent are approaching from the mountains to the east. Their numbers are beyond anything we've ever seen!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: What!? But Y'shtola and the others...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Anyone outside of Tertium is in danger. We must find and bring them all here at once!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Can we count on your aid, Zero?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I've already settled the debt for my question. I'm not obligated to help.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: What's more, death in this world is absolute. You ask me to put my life on the line.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Without suitable payment, I will do no such thing.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: That's fair... What do we have to offer that might be enough?

dialogue.name: JULLUS
dialogue.text: You're right, Zero. You're not obligated to help, and I wouldn't presume otherwise.

dialogue.name: JULLUS
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, we are in need. Assuming the buuz I gave you is worth anything, would you at least be willing to stand watch at this encampment?

dialogue.name: JULLUS
dialogue.text: That way, more of us will be able to go out and see the people to safety.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: ...Very well. Unless we come under attack, I'll do no more than stand watch.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I daresay Tertium will be safe enough with Zero here.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Let us go and find Y'shtola and the others, and assist with the evacuation.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Do what you must. I will remain here.

dialogue.name: JULLUS
dialogue.text: Please hurry. Time is of the essence.

dialogue.name: GARLEANSOLDIER10320
dialogue.text: Never have I seen so many voidsent... We've got to round up as many hands as we can to assist with the evacuation effort.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Come, we need to find our comrades.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Tertium will be fine. Jullus and his people have weathered far worse.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We must make haste to the snowcraft, where our friends and the engineer should be.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Given their position, they may soon find themselves at the mercy of the voidsent. If it comes to it, we must be prepared for battle.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'm ready, don't you worry.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: How about you, Forename?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
Upon departing from Tertium, several cutscenes will play in sequence.
It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In addition, you will be required to participate in battle. Your progress will be saved at certain points. In the event that you are defeated, you will be able to try again from the most recent of these.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that if you enter battles associated with other quests or log out from the game, this progress will be lost.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be a Disciple of War or Magic of level 90 or above to proceed.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: For a mercy, there appears to have been no casualties in Tertium or elsewhere.

dialogue.name: JULLUS
dialogue.text: I've also received word that the transport arrived safely at Camp Broken Glass. They send their thanks to the “woman in black.”

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: ...I'm fine. I just need rest.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Zero's convalescing aboard the train. Jullus has already given her something to eat, so I suppose all we can do is wait.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I can't help but wonder, though... What possessed her to go and fight all those voidsent on her own? Not that I know the going rate for such things, but I doubt one buuz would suffice. I think someone has been a bad influence on her.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Oh, I'm just joking. Or am I?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: In any case, many people owe her their lives. I'll be sure to thank her when she's back on her feet.
